import Foundation

let inp = readLine()!.components(separatedBy: [" "]).map { $0 }
let (s1, s2) = (inp[0], inp[1])

import Foundation

func isOddEven(_ number : Int) -> String {
    if number % 2 == 0 {
        return "even"   
    }
    else {
        return "odd"
    }
}

print("\(a) is \(isOddEven(a))")

// 1 is odd
